definition.name: Pagination
definition.description: A container component that wraps pagination elements and provides proper semantic markup with navigation role. It centers its content and allows for custom className props to be passed.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the navigation element

definition.visualLayout: A centered navigation container that spans the full width of its parent

definition.name: PaginationContent
definition.description: An unordered list component that arranges pagination items in a horizontal row with consistent spacing. Uses React.forwardRef to allow ref forwarding.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the list element

definition.visualLayout: A horizontal flex container with small gaps between items

definition.name: PaginationItem
definition.description: A list item component that serves as a container for individual pagination elements like links or ellipsis. Uses React.forwardRef for ref forwarding.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the list item

definition.name: PaginationLink
definition.description: A styled anchor component that represents a clickable page number or navigation action. Can be styled differently when active.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the link

isActive.description: Whether this link represents the current page

definition.name: PaginationPrevious
definition.description: A specialized PaginationLink component that represents the 'Previous' navigation action, including a chevron left icon.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the previous button

definition.visualLayout: A button with a left-pointing chevron icon and 'Previous' text

definition.name: PaginationNext
definition.description: A specialized PaginationLink component that represents the 'Next' navigation action, including a chevron right icon.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the next button

definition.visualLayout: A button with a right-pointing chevron icon and 'Next' text

definition.name: PaginationEllipsis
definition.description: A component that displays an ellipsis to indicate skipped page numbers in the pagination sequence. Uses the MoreHorizontal icon.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the ellipsis container

definition.visualLayout: A centered container with a horizontal ellipsis icon and hidden 'More pages' text for screen readers
